Reviews.Title: well satisfied customer.
Reviews.Author: Tede
Reviews.Content: I was pleasantly surprised. The items ordered came promptly with all that was promised. The bag was the only item that I was kind of disappointed with (too small). All came with 3 different sets of batteries(great).

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: MAGEE
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my daughter. I am very impressed with the quality of pictures. I have young grand children and the high speed really works. It has so many features, my daughter is still trying to learn the camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: R. Ramirez
Reviews.Content: This is my second Fuji semipro camera, and this is so much better, loaded with technology. I am sure this company takes in consideration its customers opinion when developing this products... Kudos for Fuji.

Reviews.Title: high resolution equipment
Reviews.Author: metalmaniatico
Reviews.Content: fully digital, 100% ful hd, optic adjustable, highly manageable, very high quality of motion and light sensors IMAJE advice of high quality and duralidad

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: D Woods
Reviews.Content: I thought this camera was a good mid range camera, well it takes really good pictures and allows you to record video. My wife absolutely loves this camera. She has been using this camera non-stop since Christmas of 2011. One of the best electronic investments i have made.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: EJ
Reviews.Content: Great everyday camera. Would recommend for new or experienced photographers.the accessories were useful. light but easy to grasp. Get one.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: AshleyJ
Reviews.Content: I totally recommend this camera to ANYONE! It takes fabulous pictures when in Auto mode, and is also fully manual if you want to put in a little more effort.  The kit is alright.  The extra rechargeable batteries are nice, but the case and most of the little extras are poor quality.  The camera actually doesn't even fit well in the case.

Reviews.Title: My Fujifilm HS20
Reviews.Author: Betty White
Reviews.Content: I take this camera everywhere.  I bought it for birding and camping. It's light weight and ready to go.  This package has everything I needed.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera but bundle could be better
Reviews.Author: aravind "Aravind"
Reviews.Content: Camera: the fujifilm HS20EXR is a great camera that takes wonderful images. I am a novice photographer and this camera looks and feels like a DSLR. I especially like the manual zoom for its feel. One might want to check out the fujiguys channel on youtube to get a good understanding of the camera features.Accessory Bundle: The price for the bundle with 8 re-chargeable batteries, a 16 GB memory card and camera bag is good, but I am very disappointed with the tripod and the battery charger. The charger that I got was very flimsy and one of its sockets was damaged. In addition, it would falsely indicate that the batteries were charged, so a couple of times I had them die on me after a single shot. I would recommend that you invest in a good charger. I am currently using a duracell charger and it seems to be working well.Additionally, when I saw the image of the tripod I assumed it would be much bigger. However, the one in the bundle is really tiny and is pretty much of no use as the camera keeps tipping over. The only use of this tripod is when one wants to clean the camera, but since it is so small I am unable to use it.In all, the price is good for all that you get, but I would recommend buying a separate charger.

Reviews.Title: akawillie
Reviews.Author: akawillie
Reviews.Content: Product was everything I expected, and more.  Friends who saw what I received could not believe I got so much for the price I paid.  Very happy with what I recieved, and the timely shipping and delivery.

Reviews.Title: Gran camara y buenos accesorios
Reviews.Author: Mg
Reviews.Content: Es sin duda una gran camara para el que quiera empezar a tomar fotos un poco mas profesionales y los accesorios sob de gran calidad

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: smokingun
Reviews.Content: love it ease of operation sleek design and has all the features i was looking for in a digital camera beats my cell phone pics for advertisingFujifilm FinePix HS20 16 MP Digital Camera with EXR BSI CMOS High Speed Sensor and Fujinon 30x Wide Angle Optical Zoom Lens
